name: Dark Project Honeypot
description: Change Project Honeypot (http://www.projecthoneypot.org) to white text on a black background to make it easier on the eyes of aging webmasters. Nothing fancy. Works for me. I am igor at http://techlorebyigor.blogspot.com and I code dark styles for several web sites. Wherever there is white, let us replace that with black.

user.name: amethyst_igor
user.about: There is no end and no beginning, because there is light in the darkness and it renews all things. Life and death are not serious alternatives. We derive from and merge into the light through eternity, so there is no end to us and no beginning.
